title: Not receiving email for pw reset
body: I wanted to log in to my PBE account and test the assassin updates but I can't remember the log in information. I requested both my username and pw be sent to me several times over the last 2 days and haven't gotten anything. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
It sounds like you should [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our account specialists can assist you in recovering this account.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
